duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide high-touch customer service to senior health members, ensuring a positive in-office patient experience.
Perform front-of-house duties including check-in/check-out, insurance verification, and patient intake.
Assist senior patients with administrative tasks such as answering phone calls, sending faxes, and coordinating transportation.
Contribute to team development through huddles, problem-solving, and supporting in-office providers with ad hoc tasks.
Master technology suite including Slack, G-suite, Zoom, Circulation, RingCentral, and Electronic Medical Record System.
Perform opening and closing duties, maintain office spaces, restock supplies, and organize.

education_certification.credential: At least 1 year of experience in high-touch customer or patient-facing roles
